title: Nursing Practical Competency Strengthening: Data-Driven Technology-Integrated Mathematics Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze core elements of technology-integrated learning design (engagement, self-efficacy) using data mining techniques
Learners can establish personalized math learning strategies based on learning data collected in mobile environments
Learners can model mathematical thinking processes required for real-world problem-solving with over 80% accuracy using smartphone-based tools

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
